settings.disableEmberRodAbility: Swab Ember Rod on Yer Island
settings.dontResetCursorInventory: Don't reset cursor between yer inventories
settings.makeEnderchestsInEndGreen: Make Enderchests in this 'ere End Green
settings.dontOpenProfileWithBow: Don't Open yer mates' profiles wit' Bow
settings.avoidBreakingBottomSugarCane: Avast breakin' bottom o' Sugarrr Cane
settings.replaceRomanNumeralsWithNumbers: Replace Roman Numerals on yer Items

messages.dropConfirmation: 'ay lad, drop this here item again to confirm!
messages.fullInventory: Ahoy mate, yer pouch there be full!
messages.newVersion: Avast, before you wander the seven seas, you best update to %newestVersion%! Click this here text to 'ave it.
messages.discord: Ye a curious lad, 'uh? click 'ere to join me ol' Discord.
messages.developmentVersion: Har, you're running a development version: %version%. Yer latest stable build be %newestVersion%
messages.labymod: 'ay ye LabyMod Lads: 'ide grub, booty, an' 'ealth bar, be incompatible.
messages.minionCannotReach: Arr, mate, one o' yer %type% crew couldn't reach an' stopped spawnin'!
messages.minionIsFull: Lad, A minion on yer island be full!
messages.slotLocked: Ahoy, matey! This here slot be locked!
messages.cancelledStemBreak: 'ay there, SkyblockAddons 'as stopped ye from breakin' this here stem. Use yer bare hand if ye'd like to break it.
messages.cancelledCaneBreak: 'ay there, SkyblockAddons 'as stopped ye from breakin' this here block oâ€™ sugarcane. Use yer bare hand if ye'd like to break it.
messages.cancelledProfileOpening: 'ay there lad! SkyblockAddons 'as stopped ye from openin' this here player's profile while oldin' a bow.
messages.cancelledDropping: 'ay mate! SkyblockAddons 'as stopped ye from droppin' this here Rare Item or Tool from yer 'otbarrr.
messages.clickMoreTimes: 'ay lad, Click/Drop this here item %times% more times if ye really wants t' do this.
